description:
Shop brands you love:

- Shop big brands and local stores, and follow your faves
- Get notified about special offers, price drops, restocks, and new product drops
- Save items for later and organize things into collections (like “camping gear” or “ideas for dad”)
- Just so you know: brands don’t pay extra to sell on Shop, which means each time you buy, you’re helping out the business

Check out with one tap:

- Your payment info, shipping address, and shopping preferences all live in your secure Shop Pay wallet
- Just tap to check out (no more getting up to go find your card)
- Every shopping cart from every store is saved on Shop, so it’s all there when you’re ready to check out
- Just so you know: your info is safe with Shop, which meets strict PCI compliance standards

Track all your orders:

- See every order from every store you buy from
- Map exactly where each package is now
- Shop can even scan your email for new order info and collect it for you in the app (no more searching your inbox for updates) 

- - -

Have a question or just want to say hello? Contact us by visiting help.shop.app

Shop secure and worry free: Our servers meet strict PCI compliance standards for vaulting credit card info.

Powered by Shopify: Shop was created by the commerce platform trusted by millions of businesses worldwide.

Dele af appen kan du bruge uden at logge på, mens fx adgang til kontooplysninger kræver, at du er logget ind.

Før du logger på, kan du:
• Søge butikker ud fra din placering (via gps)
• Søge butikker efter kategori
• Søge butikker på postnummer og eller butiksnavn
• Se aktuelle kampagner

The idea is simple: you sell your pre-loved stuff to other members who’ll love it again. They get the thrill of unboxing a great find, you get more space at home. It's look-good, do-good, feel-good, for everyone. 

Selling is easy and free
Snap photos of your item, describe it, and set your price. You keep 100% of what you earn.  
• Cash in on your pre-loved clothes, homeware and appliances, electronics, collectables, kids’ toys, and more. 
• Watch your earnings grow. Send your money straight to your bank account. 
• Buyers cover shipping costs. You get prepaid labels that make things simple. 

Shop new-again finds 				
Feel proud of your second-hand discoveries, from designer gems to great-value tech. 
• Fast finds, long-lasting love. There’s a Vinted category for almost everything, use filters to speed up shopping. 
• We’ve got your back. When you buy on Vinted, we cover you with Buyer Protection. For a small fee, you’ll get a refund if your item is lost, damaged in delivery, or significantly not as described. 
• Choose a shipping carrier and have your order sent to your home or a convenient pick-up point.  

Get added confidence
There are 2 verification services on Vinted to give you peace of mind when trading more expensive pieces. 
Item Verification for designer fashion
Have selected items checked for authenticity by our team of experts. 
Electronics Verification 
For certain tech items, get the functionality, condition, and authenticity verified. 
You’ll only receive items that pass the check, or get a refund. Opt to buy verification during checkout. 

There’s a diverse community of second-hand enthusiasts waiting to meet you. Chat with your fellow members, get updates, and manage your orders all in one place. 

Come join us
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@vinted 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/vinted
Find out more in our Help Centre: https://www.vinted.co.uk/help

Shop on Temu for exclusive offers. 

No matter what you're looking for, Temu has you covered, including fashion, home decor, handmade crafts, beauty & cosmetics, clothing, shoes, and more.

Download Temu today and enjoy incredible deals daily.

WIDE SELECTION

Visit temu.com or follow us on:

description:
LIDL PLUS: Find Food Deals, Grocery Coupons and Shopping Rewards on the Products You Love! The service is aimed at customers who'd like to receive personalised information from Lidl Stiftung about Lidl Plus promotions, as well as offers, products and services from Lidl Companies and selected partners. We personalise this information based on your purchase and usage behaviour of the products and services of the Lidl Companies.

Incredible grocery discounts every time you shop with Lidl! ‘Straight in my basket!’ 

Download, register and save even more. Lidl Plus is our new rewards app, designed to give you discounts on the products you love. 

The service is aimed at customers who'd like to receive personalised information from Lidl Stiftung about Lidl Plus promotions, as well as offers, products and services from Lidl Companies and selected partners. We personalise this information based on your purchase and usage behaviour of the products and services of the Lidl Companies.

Available in Republic of Ireland, Northern Ireland, Great Britain and Malta. 

We’ll send you Lidl coupons based on the products that you love. Simply activate your coupons and scan in store to make incredible savings on your Lidl shopping. 

Every time you shop, you will also get the chance to win amazing prizes*. So what’s not to like? Check out the best things about the Lidl Plus loyalty app and how to use it.

HOW TO GET LIDL PLUS LOYALTY REWARDS:

 - Activate your coupons in the app and scan your digital Lidl Plus Card at the till to redeem and save money on your shop.
 - Scan your digital Lidl Plus Card at the till for the chance to win great prizes* on each store visit!
 -  Never lose a receipt again. You’ll get a purchase summary and a digital copy of your receipt with Lidl Plus.
 -  Never miss another offer. Browse through a digital version of our weekly leaflet in the app.

Plus many more exciting features!

We made this app to reward you for shopping at Lidl and to help you find deals on your favourite foods, drinks and household items. 

From amazing food coupons to saving money on your next shop – Lidl Plus is the app to download if you want to get the best food deals and shopping discounts. We’re always looking to help you enjoy quality products at great prices, so download our free loyalty app and register today and find food deals, shopping rewards and grocery coupons on the products you love.

*This feature is not available in all countries.

When joining the Lidl Plus program, you can allow tracking technology, which helps us to understand how you interact with the app. This includes what pages you visit, what coupons you view, and how long you spend on each page. This tracking allows Lidl Plus to improve the app and provide you with tailored communication, discounts and to participate in relevant surveys.

Data Protection Policy:
Great Britain: https://www.lidl.co.uk/c/lidl-plus-privacy-notice/s10023377?salesChannel=02
Republic of Ireland: https://www.lidl.ie/c/lidl-plus-data-protection/s10024073?salesChannel=02

Slovenia: https://www.lidl.si/c/lidl-plus-varstvo-osebnih-podatkov/s10020643?salesChannel=02

Terms of use:

Republic of Ireland: https://www.lidl.ie/c/lidl-plus-terms-of-use/s10024080?salesChannel=02

Slovenia: https://www.lidl.si/c/lidl-plus-splosni-pogoji-uporabe/s10020644?salesChannel=02

I Netto+ appen får du bl.a. Personlige +Priser, friskhedsgaranti, Scan&Go og mange andre fordele. Vi har lavet Netto+ til dig, så du kan spare både tid og penge, når du handler i din Netto-butik.

1. Stærke priser med Netto+ ("+Priser" og "Personlige +Priser")

Netto+ handler om dig og det, du kan lide. Vi giver dig ugentligt stærke +Priser og hver måned Personlige +Priser, som er udvalgt ud fra dit indkøbsmønster. Jo mere du bruger Netto+ appen, jo mere relevante bliver dine personlige +Priser.

2. Scan og betal dine varer mens du handler (”Scan&Go”)

Scan dine varer med din telefon og pak dem med det samme i din indkøbspose, mens du handler. Du betaler med et enkelt swipe i appen og kan gå ud af butikken uden at stå i kø ved kassen. Det er nemt og du sparer tid.
NB. Gælder kun i udvalgte Netto-butikker.

3. Friskhedsgaranti og kvitteringsoversigt ("Kvitteringer")

Er du kommet hjem med en mad- eller drikkevare, der ikke er som forventet? Inden for 5 dage efter dit køb, kan du refundere alle mad- og drikkevarer. Find kvitteringen i appen, send os et billede og få pengene tilbage på et tilgodebevis. Nemt og hurtigt – uden kørsel tilbage til butikken. 

4. Ugens Netto-avis ("Netto-avis")

Læs ugens Netto-avis og se alle de aktuelle priser. Du kan nemt tilføje varer til din indkøbsliste ved at trykke på produkterne i Netto-avisen.

5. En indkøbsliste du altid har med ("Indkøbsliste")

Lav en digital indkøbsliste i din Netto+ app. Tilføj hurtigt og nemt varer til indkøbslisten. Du kan dele indkøbslisten med familie og venner, så er du sikker på altid at komme hjem med det hele.

6. Tjek prisen ("Tjek prisen")

Det er nemt at tjekke prisen på varer i Netto-butikken. Brug scanneren i Netto+ appen til at scanne varens stregkode og få oplyst prisen på varen.

Som en del af dit medlemskab indsamler og behandler vi bl.a. dine købsdata, og hvordan du bruger appen for at gøre Netto+ mest muligt relevant for dig. Du kan læse mere i privatlivspolitikken på https://netto.dk/nettoplus/nettoplus-privatlivspolitik/ og om konceptet på netto.dk/nettoplus

FLEXIBLE WAYS TO PAY
Choose to pay in 3 interest-free instalments, pay the full amount, in 30 days or with financing.¹

¹ UK: Klarna’s Pay in 3/Pay in 30 days are unregulated credit agreements. Klarna Financing is regulated if it charges interest or lasts over 12 months. It is not regulated if it’s 0% interest and 12 months or less. Borrowing more than you can afford or paying late may negatively impact your financial status and ability to obtain credit. 18+, UK residents only. Klarna’s Regulated Financing has a representative APR of 21.9% (fixed).

¹ Ireland: Please shop responsibly. 18+ ROI residents only. Credit subject to status. APR 0%. Missed payments may incur a fee and affect your ability to use Klarna in the future. T&Cs apply. https://www.klarna.com/ie/terms-and-conditions/. 

SHOP ANYWHERE IN THE KLARNA APP
Access Klarna's flexible payment options anywhere - shop at your favorite stores and split your purchase with the payment plan that suits you.

UP TO 10% CASHBACK
Shop in the app and earn up to 10% cashback. Get cashback at hundreds of stores in the app.²

² Klarna Cashback Rewards are awarded as points which can be redeemed for a credit to your Klarna Balance and other benefits. Earn cashback on Klarna App purchases. Klarna balance account required. Cashback issuance depends on store approval and may be affected by cookie settings, combining offers, product exclusions, or other factors beyond our control. Klarna may get a commission. Limitations, terms and conditions apply.

SHOP WITH THE KLARNA CARD
Pay with Klarna anywhere Visa is accepted. Pay now or pay later with the card. No fees and no credit impact to apply.³ 

³ UK & Ireland: A paid Klarna Membership is required for a physical card. Klarna Membership offered for a monthly fee. Cancel any time in the Klarna app. Exclusions, conditions, and limitations apply to membership benefits like Klarna Membership cashback. Klarna Membership Terms apply.

UNLOCK YOUR KLARNA BALANCE
Add money to your balance and pay flexibly, anywhere you shop. Get instant refunds, earn cashback at eligible stores, and convert your cashback as a credit in your balance.⁴

⁴ Ireland: Account covered by the Swedish deposit guarantee scheme. Max. compensation per customer: SEK 1,050,000. National Debt Office makes compensation available within 7 business days from the date a right to compensation accrues. Read more here.

USE KLARNA WITH APPLE PAY
Split the cost with Klarna on Apple Pay, available in-store and online.

FIND THE BEST PRICE, EVERY TIME
Search for any product and instantly compare prices across stores.

HASSLE-FREE RETURNS
Need to send something back? Report a return right in the app. We’ll pause your purchase so you don’t have to pay in the meantime.

TRACK ALL YOUR DELIVERIES
Get real-time updates, arrival times, and pickup photos—right in the Klarna app.

24/7 CUSTOMER SERVICE
Use our chat in the Klarna app for 24/7 support.

The Zalando app is your new go-to for quality fashion and lifestyle brands (over 6,000!), outfit and beauty inspiration at your fingertips, and a shopping experience that’s all smooth and no stress.

IT'S GIVING INSPIRATION
• Follow your favourite creators for outfit and styling inspo
• Follow brands you like to see more from them first, including new releases and exclusive collections
• Curate and follow boards of the outfits, videos, and products that inspire you, and start inspiring others
• Explore what’s trending across Europe with Trend Spotter and see what everyone’s wearing in Berlin, Paris, and Milan right now
• Tune into our Live videos to get tips from the experts, product how-tos, and inspo you can add directly to your bag
• Tap into Stories to get your style and culture guide with features like “What do I wear?” plus the latest on major brand collabs
• Save your faves to your wishlist and never miss a size update or price drop

IT'S GIVING CHOICE
• Browse over 11,000 items from a wide range of brands, including all-time fashion favourites
• Dive into our different assortments: clothing, shoes, accessories, sports, beauty and skincare, preloved gems, and kidswear
• Get updates on the things you care about - from news and trends to sales and discount codes
• Hear about new collections and product launches from the brands you love
• Never miss a price drop or restock by opting in to notifications on items in your wishlist
• Give preloved clothing a new life when you shop our extensive selection of pre-owned (but just like new!) clothing, accessories, and boots
Pick your preferred way to pay and enjoy delivery directly to your own doorstep

IT'S GIVING PERSONAL
• Benefit from spot-on recommendations that show you the items you’ll love, without you needing to go looking for them
• Rate how the fashion you’ve ordered fits and get personalised sizing advice as you shop
• Get measured with our measurements tool to find what fits, fast
• Try on outfits in our virtual fitting room to see how they’ll fit before ordering
• Get instant style and outfit advice from the Zalando Assistant, a tailor-made AI-powered fashion assistant to help you on your shopping journey

So, ready to explore the app?
Shop the brands you love, unlock exclusive deals, and get inspiration and recommendations that feel like they were made just for you.

Automatic price check
Molly automatically checks the price of the product you're looking at. If you can save money on other webshops, you’ll get direct links to the cheapest option.

Automatic discount check
Have you noticed that almost all webshops have a discount code field? Molly automatically finds and applies discount codes for you and keeps the one that gives you the biggest savings. No more wasting time searching for doubtful codes. Molly works in more than 25,000 webshops, and we’re constantly adding new ones.

Price alerts
Is the item lovely but too expensive? Let Molly track price drops and notify you as soon as the price fits your budget. You can also track price drops on wishlists shared by friends and family.

Help to save
In some situations, Molly gives a discreet tip on where you can save the most. Even when you search on Google, Molly highlights where you can get extra discounts.

Save favourites
You can easily add your favourite products to your own lists. If you're looking for a new bike, create a list of all the ones you’re considering. Molly gives you an overview and finds the lowest prices for each of your favourites.

Share wishlists
When you see an item you want, add it to your wishlist with one click and share it with friends and family. They can reserve items so you get exactly what you want.

Safety
Have you ever discovered bad shop ratings too late? Molly automatically shows you reviews before you shop. With Molly installed, you can shop more safely. Help us warn others about scams – write to kontakt@mollyapp.dk

Search & save
Molly gives you a shortcut to find the cheapest prices on the product you’re considering. You might even save more with a discount code.

Visibility
As your shopping assistant, Molly is always within reach. Important messages pop up automatically – otherwise, click the icon for info. Molly automatically minimizes when you continue on the webshop.

One-click copy
If Molly can’t test the discount codes herself, you can always try them manually. Just tap the code to copy it automatically, then paste it into the discount code field.

Sharing discount codes
If you have a discount code you want to share with other users, you can email it to us at kontakt@mollyapp.dk
 or enter it in the webshop’s discount field, and Molly will ask if you want to share it.

Follow webshops
Click the heart when visiting your favourite webshop. Molly will let you know when new discount codes can save you money. Keep an eye on the NEW icon so you don’t miss a good deal.

Made for you
Molly expands automatically with information useful to most users. If certain message types aren’t your style, you can disable them in the settings – for example reviews or helpful tips.

With Savier, you'll never have to search for a discount code again, and you'll never doubt if you've landed on a fraudulent store.

Savier finds discount codes for you and automatically applies the one with the biggest savings at checkout.

Savier also helps you with price comparison live while you shop, alerting you instantly if the item is available cheaper at another store.

Among many other smart features, your new assistant provides warnings about scam webshops and live insights into various stores' credibility and reviews.

Savier is funded by our users through partnerships. We earn money via advertising partnerships, including price comparison platforms and affiliate marketing. If you click on price tables marked "Collaboration with Pricerunner," Pricerunner may earn a small amount per click, of which we receive a share. It doesn’t matter whether you make a purchase or not.

The other type of advertising partnership is affiliate marketing, where we collaborate with advertisers through the following affiliate networks:

- Adtraction
- Partner-ads
- Awin
- Tradedoubler
- Daisycon
- Addrevenue
- Adrecord

We only run affiliate collaborations with webshops that have actively approved Savier and our advertising model. We earn money by referring customers to a product or store. For on-page activities, Savier acts as a positive touchpoint in the user journey for the store – for instance, by increasing conversion rates – before we activate affiliate links, which we open in a new browser window to avoid interrupting users while they shop.

The IKEA mobile app is where your inspiration comes to life. Find that cute armchair you saw at your friend’s place or look through thousands of products and ideas just for you - to make your space truly your own.

Whether you’re looking to buy online or in-store, the IKEA app is your perfect shopping companion.

Scan the products while you walk through the store  - and skip the checkout line.

Are you planning a big project or small home improvements? Save and organise your favourites in lists for later. They are ready when you are!

Found the perfect IKEA furniture or home decoration? Let us do the heavy lifting. Order home delivery and be informed every step of the way, by tracking your order easily in the app.

The IKEA app is also a convenient home for your IKEA Family benefits. Access your IKEA Family card quickly and find all your past receipts conveniently in one location.

IKEA values your data privacy and believes in ethical use of customer data. That’s why you’re in control of all your data at all times.

With REMA1000's new SCAN SELV app, you can now pack while shopping and skip the queue when paying. Simple & fast!

SCAN SELV can be used in all REMA1000 stores.

When you are in the store:
1.	Find your store in the app
2.	Scan your items
3.	Pay with a single swipe
4.	Scan the QR-code in the app by the exit 
5.	Take your products with you and enjoy the rest of your day

You can also see and share all your SCAN SELV receipts.

Create an account easily in the app – if you already have a REMA1000 account, it can be used on all REMA1000 platforms.

In addition, Zara's children's collection includes its Edited/customisable section, a selection of customisable clothing and accessories that is updated weekly. 


In addition to our permanent collections, with our Zara App you can find all our special launches, our beauty category and our lingerie line. 

Other utilities of the Zara App are:  
-	Favourites: Use your favourites list to save all the clothes and accessories you like.
-	Easy, intuitive and fast tracking of orders and returns. Track your order in each part of the process. 
-	Find your nearest Zara store. 
-	Activate notifications and receive information about new arrivals, launchings, special collections... 


Store mode 
-	Use your application in ""store mode"" when you are shopping in any of our stores and use all its features to improve your experience. 


Zara QR:
Use your QR on the Zara App for: 
-	Having associated all of your purchases online and at physical stores. At a physical store, identify yourself at the till with your Zara QR code and request an e-receipt.
-	In-store returns for both online and in-store purchases.
-	Collect all of your online orders at a physical store.

Boozt – The Nordic Department Store

Discover the latest trends and collections for women, men, and kids, and shop
from our five popular categories: Fashion, Kids, Sport, Beauty, and Home.

Download the app and enjoy these special benefits and features:
- Get notified on sales offers and special discounts.
- Enjoy ultra-fast delivery
- 30-day free return policy.
- Keep track of your orders.
- Quick, easy, and secure payment options.
- Shop a wide variety of products from our five departments: Fashion, Kids,Sport, Beauty, Home.
- Browse among 700+ Scandinavian and international brands.
- Explore our Designer shop full of carefully selected premium brands.
- Stay updated on the latest trends and collections.
- Enable push notifications to receive instant alerts about sales, special discounts, and new collections.
- Save your favourite styles in a wishlist for future purchases.
- Follow your favourite brands and get notified about new collections andre stocks.
- Shop sustainable fashion from our Made with Care category.
- Explore ReBoozt, where you can shop and sell pre-loved Boozt items.
- Join Club Boozt and earn points, that will unlock extra discounts and special benefits, each time you shop.
- Reach out to our friendly customer service team whenever you need help.

Shop on the go with the Nordic Department Store in your pocket!

Det er i Club Matas app’en det hele sker! Det er her du får det fulde overblik over alle dine fordele som medlem af Danmarks største kundeklub, og det er søreme også her du får den nemmeste og personlige shopping-oplevelse, når du går på jagt mellem Matas 50.000 produkter. Søg, scan en stregkode eller tag et billede, og vi finder hurtigt det, du ønsker. 

Eller tilmeld dig Mine Brands, hvor du optjener gratis bonusgaver, når du shopper særligt meget fra et eller flere bestemte brands. Savner du spænding? Så deltag dagligt i konkurrencer – hver dag – og vind skønne præmier! 

Elsker du at handle i vores Matas butikker – så er app’en også din ven! Du kan nemlig swipe app’en I BUTIK – og så hjælper den dig med at få styr på din rabat lige nu og her – både i form af point og medlemstilbud kun til dig! Er du i tvivl om et produkt – så er app’en også vanvittig god at have på dig! Du kan nemlig scanne alle produkter og se alle de produktanmeldelser som vores fantastiske medlemmer har givet, så du kan ramme rigtigt, når du handler hos os! Bingo! Hele Matas - og lidt til - i din lomme!

Du kan altid kontakte os på kundeservice@matas.dk eller på 48 16 55 44.

Do your shopping on the Sephora app: have access to over 16,000 makeup, fragrance, beauty brands and much more! 
Benefit from numerous exclusive promotions, make-up and skincare tutorials on the app. You'll be able to book an appointment with an expert in one of our stores and share your experience with the Sephora beauty community! 

This is your chance to take advantage of the various features now available on the Sephora app.

*SHOP FOR YOUR BEAUTY PRODUCTS
- Access all our products and accessories. Some of our products are even available in preview on the app.

- Discover our wide range of products: perfume, cream, day cream, tonic lotion, nourishing oil, hair mask, matifying care, mascara, eyeshadow palettes, foundation, lipstick, lip gloss...

- Find your favorite cosmetic brands, fragrances and beauty tools like Huda Beauty, Too Faced, Benefit Cosmetics, Urban Decay, Fenty Beauty, Kat von D, Beauty Blender, Charlotte Tilbury, Rare Beauty,Yves Saint Laurent, Christian Dior, Gucci, Make Up Forever ,Clarins, Lancôme, Clinique, Estée Lauder, Givenchy, Guerlain, Kenzo, Paco Rabanne, Jo Malone London, Armani, Bobbi Brown, Marc Jacobs Beauty, Dyson, Kérastase, Sephora Collection...!
- You'll also find all the products from Sephora Collection, an inspiring and ever-evolving.

Don't miss out on the facial care products, including the anti-imperfection serum that will purify your face, the aloe vera hand masks, not forgetting the wide range of eyeshadow palettes.

- Use our WISHLIST feature to save your favorite beauty products and fragrances.
- Enjoy exclusive promotions on makeup, perfumes, nail polishes, skincare, beauty accessories...
- Take advantage of Click&Collect even on the app.
- Smooth, easy navigation for fast, stress-free shopping!
- Feel free to check out our special offers/deals category. You'll discover all our current offers for successful make-up in collaboration with superb brands. 
You'll also be able to take advantage of free products (miniatures) above a certain purchase amount.

*IN NEED OF INSPIRATION?
- Many beauty tutorials are available on the app.
- Find all our tips, tricks and makeup, skincare and haircare trends, for the perfect look.
- Take advantage of personalized recommendations during your shopping session on the Sephora app.

*DISCOVER OUR BEAUTY SERVICES EVEN IN STORE
- Find the nearest Sephora store to your location and everywhere else.
- Book an appointment at the makeup bar for a complete makeover or at the Benefit Brow bar for eyebrow waxing, eyebrow tinting or false eyelash application....
- Our cosmetics experts will take good care of you, and you can enjoy a personalized makeup session in-store according to your desires.

*EXPERIENCE SEPHORA WITH OUR BEAUTY BOARD
- Join our beauty community and share your reviews on the Sephora app.
- Get inspired by the trendy looks created by our community.
- Discover your favorite makeup products, fragrances, looks, treatments and beauty routines on the BEAUTY BOARD.
- Shop and share your different looks and new make-up routines with the community.

***

The team is always ready to pamper you.

Thank you for using the SEPHORA app!

Warm welcome to Tradera, the largest marketplace in the Nordics. 


At Tradera, both buyers and sellers are verified, making Tradera a safe and secure marketplace. Payments are made through integrated payment methods. Items can easily be shipped directly to your home.

We have three million items for sale, and whether you're looking for a PlayStation, a retro scooter, a pasta machine, plants, or a winter jacket, we dare to promise that there's something for you.

If you want to sell items you no longer use, Tradera is the right place to turn those unused items into money in a simple and secure way. As a seller, you decide how you want to sell, whether through exciting auctions or quick purchases via our "Buy Now" format. As soon as the item is sold, you can easily book shipping directly in the app and receive a QR code on your mobile.

At Tradera, we are passionate about making circular shopping as easy and safe as buying new, and we are proud and happy that you are here, driving the change with us!

More advantages of Tradera:

For sellers:
- It's easy to sell. No haggling or similar from buyers, making the experience very smooth, and the selling process "takes care of itself."
- No meetings with strangers unless you choose to. 
- Shipping at Tradera is simple and smooth. You can choose whether you want to offer pickup, which is also possible.
- Simple integrated shipping directly in the app.
- You can see immediately in the app when the buyer has paid, and you can book shipping and send the package using the shipping method you have chosen.

For buyers:
- Just as easy to shop on Tradera as buying new. You can easily participate in bidding through autobids if you want.
- Add unique items to your watchlist to not miss out when the bidding ends.
- If you want to shop directly and don't want to wait for a bid to end, it's possible to "Buy Now" on items with that format. You can also filter for it directly in your search results if you only want to see these items.
- If an auction has ended but the item hasn't been sold, you can now also send a buyer inquiry even after the auction has ended.
- After winning an auction or purchasing an item, you can easily pay via various payment methods directly in the app.

Welcome to Tradera!

developer: Hangzhou Alibaba International Information Technology Co., Ltd.
description:
What is Alibaba.com?
Alibaba.com is one of the world’s leading B2B ecommerce marketplaces. Our app allows you to source products from global suppliers, all from the convenience of your mobile device.

Purchase with confidence
Our Trade Assurance service protects your orders and payments on the platform, letting you purchase securely and conveniently with extended support.

Customizable products
Meet suppliers with years of customization and order fulfillment experience for sellers on Amazon, eBay, Wish, Etsy, Mercari, Lazada, and more.

Easy sourcing
Discover millions of ready-to-ship products in every industry category. Tell suppliers what you need and get quotes quickly with Request for Quotation services.

Fast shipping
Alibaba.com partners with major freight forwarders to provide land, sea, and air shipping solutions with on-time delivery services, end-to-end tracking, and competitive prices.

Livestreams and factory tours
Interact with manufacturers in real-time via product demos and tours of manufacturing facilities, providing insight and oversight on how your products are made.

Popular categories and trade shows
Source a wide range of popular items – from trending consumer goods to raw materials – and join our annual trade shows for niche product highlights and discounts.

Quality control
Choose Alibaba.com Production Monitoring and Inspection Services to reduce production delay and quality risks.

Discounts and promotions
Unlock new discounts and promotions from featured manufacturers and suppliers.

Stay updated
Use the Alibaba.com app to stay up to date on new products and promotions from your favorite suppliers.

Language and currency support
Alibaba.com supports 16 languages and 140 local currencies. Use our real-time translator to communicate with sellers in your mother tongue.

The multi-tool to save money and time in everyday life. Deals and leaflets are aggregated from stores within groceries, do-it-yourself, interior, cross-border, electronics, and much more.

eTilbudsavis

Tilmeld dig Cashback i partnerskab med Visa, så får du automatisk penge tilbage, når du handler med dit Visa-kort hos mere end 1.700 butikker og webshops i Danmark samt på hotelbookinger i hele verden. 


Sådan virker det:

•	Download appen, og tilmeld dig nemt og sikkert med dine Visa-kort

•	Betal med Visa, når du handler hos tilmeldte butikker og webshops, og få automatisk en procentdel af købet tilbage i cashback.

•	Udbetal din optjente cashback din bankkonto, når du har optjent min. 100 kr., og brug pengene på det, du har lyst til. 

I appen kan du tilmelde dine Visa-kort, finde partnere i nærheden, booke hotelophold i hele verden, udbetale din optjente cashback og meget mere. Du kan også tilmelde dig via vores website cashbackmedvisa.dk.

Der er ingen gebyrer eller lignende forbundet med din tilmelding eller brug af Cashback i partnerskab med Visa.

UNIQLO App Features:
 
1. Skip the wait + get free delivery with Click & Collect
- Save on delivery and skip the wait when you select Click & Collect. Pick up your order from any UNIQLO store at a time that suits you, free of charge.
 
2. Scan barcodes to find your perfect size + fit
- Use your phone to scan the barcodes of your favorite pieces to easily check if nearby stores have your preferred size and colour. Plus, you can view reviews and other styling tips to help make shopping that much easier.
 
3. It's back! Sign up for notifications when your favourites are back in stock
- Get notified when the style you’ve been eyeing up is back in stock with the app.
 
4. It fits! MySize ASSIST
- Take the guesswork out of sizing with MySize ASSIST. Input your body measurements and preferred fit and we’ll recommend the size that we think would fit you best.
 
5. Create a wish list
- Add products you love to your wish list and we'll notify you when they come back in stock, or go on sale.

Ugens avis med tilbud, indkøbslister, opskrifter, åbningstider, sortiment og meget mere finder du i vores REMA 1000 app.  

Med appen får du således inspiration og planlægning samlet ét sted – det er opskriften på en lettere hverdag. 

Vælg mellem mere end 500 lette og lækre opskrifter og få automatisk en komplet indkøbsliste, som du kan handle ud fra i vores butikker – eller i vores anden app: SCAN SELV.

Med vores app kan du spare penge ved at tilmelde dig Favoritter på tilbud, ligesom du kan finde opskrifter lavet ud fra varer i ugens avis. 

Tilføj varer fra avisen direkte over på din REMA 1000 indkøbsliste. Når du har lavet din indkøbsliste, kan du dele den med familie, venner og kollegaer.

Med MENY-appen får du ikke bare gode medlemspriser, men ekstra inspiration. 
Glæd dig over at have ugens avis, spil, 1.500 opskrifter, indkøbsliste og meget mere, lige ved hånden. 
Hent app’en, tilknyt dit betalingskort, og glæd dig til fantastisk mange fordele og spændende overraskelser – direkte til dig. 

Vi ses i MENY!

Easily rent a trailer or an electric cargo bike completely free of charge across Denmark, Sweden, Norway and Germany. Freetrailer has made sharing simple since 2004, and with our self-service app, it's easier than ever to borrow a trailer exactly when you need it.

Here’s how it works:

1. Download the Freetrailer app
2. Find a trailer near you at one of our many partners
3. Reserve, pick up, and unlock directly from your mobile.
4. Return the trailer when you're done – quick and convenient!

With more than 1 million rentals annually, Freetrailer is always at your fingertips. Whether you're moving, heading to your summer house, or just need extra space, anyone can borrow a free trailer.

Download the app now and get on the road!

The app needs the following access permissions when it is running on your device:

-	Optional permission(s):

o	Notification: it will allow us to send push notifications to your device.

o	Camera: the camera function is required when you need to capture photos and videos and upload them to the app.

o	Photo and video: it will enable you to upload photos and videos from your device to the app.

o	Location: where the relevant service is available, it enables location based services on your device. 
(This is not used in Korea.)

o	Calendar: it enables you to sync the SHEIN LIVE events to your device calendar. 

o	Microphone: when you try to capture videos using Camera function, the app will also need the microphone access permission to capture the voice. 

※ Even if you do not grant optional access permissions, you can still use SHEIN service, except for the functions related to those permissions.
